mapper.select: select c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, c.price, t.name as teacherName, s1.title as subjectTitle, s2.title as subjectParentTitle from course as c left join teacher t on t.id = c.teacher_id left join subject as s1 on s1.id = c.subject_id left join subject as s2 on s2.id = c.subject_parent_id where c.id = #{id};
